sources.title: For Valour
sources.description: “Excellent dysfunctional extended family affair” (IMDB review quote). Another Walls and Lynn farce written for the screen by Ben Travers. This one is muti-generational involving fathers and sons. Good supporting cast. Adequate production. IMDB rating 6.3. Directed by Tom Walls. Released in 1937 (UK only). Complete print (PAL transfer)

metadata.Plot: During the Boer War a private saves the life of an officer.Years later in the Great War the private 's son is an established gentleman while the officer's son is a crook.
metadata.Actors: Tom Walls, Ralph Lynn, Veronica Rose
